feed.title: IMPACT Lab
feed.subtitle: IMPACT Lab is a developing research group focused on integrative multimodal perception and intelligent systems, led by Dr. Ghazal Rouhafzay.

entry.title: Hajarimino Rakotomanana Presents Research on Early Detection of Autism Spectrum Disorder Using Deep Learning at the NB Health Research Symposium

link.title: Hajarimino Rakotomanana Presents Research on Early Detection of Autism Spectrum Disorder Using Deep Learning at the NB Health Research Symposium

entry.content: Hajarimino Rakotomanana presented his research on early autism detection at the New Brunswick Health Research Symposium in Fredericton. His work investigates AI-based approaches for identifying early behavioral and developmental indicators using multimodal data, with the goal of supporting accessible screening tools.
entry.summary: Hajarimino Rakotomanana presented his research on early autism detection at the New Brunswick Health Research Symposium in Fredericton. His work investigates AI-based approaches for identifying early behavioral and developmental indicators using multimodal data, with the goal of supporting accessible screening tools.
